mil3.1.12:1.3: “Upatthambhanalakkhanam, maharaja, viriyam, viriyupatthambhita sabbe kusala dhamma na parihayanti”ti.
mil3.1.12:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, puriso gehe patante annena daruna upatthambheyya, upatthambhitam santam evam tam geham na pateyya;
mil3.1.12:2.3: evameva kho, maharaja, upatthambhanalakkhanam viriyam, viriyupatthambhita sabbe kusala dhamma na parihayanti”ti.
mil3.1.12:3.2: “Yatha, maharaja, parittakam senam mahati sena bhanjeyya, tato raja annamannam anussareyya anupeseyya attano parittakaya senaya balam anupadam dadeyya, taya saddhim parittaka sena mahatim senam bhanjeyya;
mil3.1.12:3.3: evameva kho, maharaja, upatthambhanalakkhanam viriyam, viriyupatthambhita sabbe kusala dhamma na parihayanti.
mil3.1.12:3.5: ‘viriyava kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavako akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti.
